document.full_text: holder francesca schiavone of italy sped into the third round of the french open as she crushed russian vesna dolonts 6-1 6-2 on wednesday.
document.title: schiavone demolishes dolonts to reach third round
lines_and_colors: holder francesca schiavone of italy sped into the third round of the french open as she crushed russian vesna dolonts 6-1 6-2 on wednesday.
